coalesce(sum(coalesce(BASE_AMOUNT, 0)), 0) from EXP_INPUT_TAX_LINE eitl where eitl.EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID = t4.id and eitl.INPUT_TAX_HEADER_ID != #{headerId} and exists (select 1 from EXP_INPUT_TAX_LINE tl, EXP_INPUT_TAX_HEADER th where tl.input_tax_header_id = th.id and tl.id = eitl.id and th.status in (1002, 1004))) ableAmount, t3.base_amount, t4.EXPENSE_DATE transferDate, t4.COMPANY_ID, t3.DEPARTMENT_ID, t4.TENANT_ID, t4.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, t4.DESCRIPTION from EXP_INPUT_TAX_LINE t3, EXP_REPORT_LINE t4 where t3.EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID = t4.id and t3.INPUT_TAX_HEADER_ID = #{headerId}) where ableAmount > 0 and exists (select 1 from exp_report_header h, exp_report_line l where l.id = expReportLineId and l.exp_report_header_id = h.id and h.status = 1004)
